description: This file defines CSS styles for a front-end application, including theme management and responsive design for components such as the App and themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with responsive design styles.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header container for the application, styled for layout and appearance.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles adapted for theme settings.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling themes, styled for interactivity.
